fn.p: Elizabeth Brunton, Ian Whelan, and Ian Burgess are shareholders in EctoMedica Limited. Elizabeth Brunton and Ian Burgess are directors of EctoMedica Limited. Ian Whelan is a director of Avisius Research Limited. Since this work was conducted, EctoMedica Limited has sold world rights to this formulation to Thornton & Ross Ltd. Insect Research & Development Limited provides paid consultancy services to Thornton & Ross Ltd.
